attributes.action: Boycott companies who do not pay tax in the UK  eg Boots, Holland & Barrett etc.
attributes.additional_details: Why does our government allow foreign investors to take money from UK citizens but pay the tax into tax havens and NOT THE UK?
attributes.background: The government has promised on many occasions to stop taxes going to tax havens...but nothing has been done!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it sounds like you are calling on consumers to take action and not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257091
